subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: On Jan. 1, Ivan Gazidis planted himself behind a desk at Arsenal’s plush Emirates Stadium in north London, and the culture shock splashed him in the face like a stream of bracing after-shave lotion.
snippet: On Jan. 1, Ivan Gazidis planted himself behind a desk at Arsenal’s plush Emirates Stadium in north London, and the culture shock splashed him in the face like a stream of bracing after-shave lotion.
